query:
SELECT g.id as gestor_id, u.name as gestor_nome, u.email
FROM gestores g
JOIN users u ON g.userId = u.id
ORDER BY u.name;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2rEtBRZHWZUfGJS.3b07a01772f8 --database 3c9MozLH35e233uWy5WDtH --execute SELECT g.id as gestor_id, u.name as gestor_nome, u.email
